name: Harvey (russmatney)
description:
A basic farming game created for the Ludum Dare #52 Jam. The theme is 'Harvest', hence, Harvey, our protagonist. The idea is somewhat Overcooked-inspired, but applied to the 'Harvest' theme.

I got bored with doing the planting, watering, harvesting, and delivery myself, so added a few bots to make it more interesting. They can get stuck between tasks, but watering any dry plants can help release them. Good luck!

Movement via WASD, actions via E.

This project is open source, and implemented as part of Dino.
